CustomField.formula: IF(UPPER( State__c ) =UPPER('Rajasthan'),'West', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Madhya Pradesh'),'West', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Gujarat'),'West', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Daman and Diu'),'West', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Dadra and Nagar Haveli'),'West', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Maharashtra'),'West', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Goa'),'West', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Andhra Pradesh'),'South', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Karnataka'),'South', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Lakshadweep'),'South', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Kerala'),'South', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Tamil Nadu'),'South', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Puducherry'),'South', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Andaman and Nicobar'),'South', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Jammu And Kashmir'),'North', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Himachal Pradesh'),'North', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Punjab'),'North', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Chandigarh'),'North', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('uttarakhand'),'North', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('haryana'),'North', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('delhi'),'North', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('uttar pradesh'),'North', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('JHARKHAND'),'East', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('West Bengal'),'East', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Mizoram'),'East', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('Odisha'),'East', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('orissa'),'East', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('bihar'),'East', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('sikkim'),'East', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('arunachal pradesh'),'East', IF(UPPER(State__c) =UPPER('NAGALAND'),'East','') ))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Zone
